CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Brass
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: brass
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Brass is a warm, golden alloy produced by blending Copper with zinc. Praised for its attractive appearance and excellent workability, brass finds extensive use in both decorative applications and practical components.
